loadGlobusCredential

public static org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential loadGlobusCredential(File proxyFile)
                                                            throws org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredentialException
Loads a GlobusCredential from a file. This method is really trivial and I only included it to have everything in one place.

Parameters:
proxyFile - the proxy file
Returns:
the GlobusCredential
Throws:
org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredentialException - if something goes wrong (e.g. the proxy is not a GlobusCredential

unwrapGlobusCredential

public static org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential unwrapGlobusCredential(GSSCredential gss)
Returns the wrapped GlobusCredential of a GSSCredential object

Parameters:
gss - the GSSCredential (has to be of type GlobusGSSCredentialImpl
Returns:
the wrapped GlobusCredential of a GSSCredential object or null if the credential object is not of type GlobusGSSCredentialImpl

wrapGlobusCredential

public static GSSCredential wrapGlobusCredential(org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential globusCred)
Wraps a GlobusCredential in a GSSCredential

Parameters:
globusCred - the credential to wrap in a GSSCredential
Returns:
a GSSCredential object that contains the GlobusCredential (the implementation class is GlobusGSSCredentialImpl)

writeToDisk

public static void writeToDisk(org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential globusCred)
                        throws IOException
Writes the specified globus credential to the default globus location on the local machine.

Parameters:
globusCred - the credential
Throws:
IOException - if something goes wrong

writeToDisk

public static void writeToDisk(org.globus.gsi.GlobusCredential globusCred,
                               File proxyFile)
                        throws IOException
Writes the specified globus credential to disk.

Parameters:
globusCred - the credential
proxyFile - the file to store the credential to (use CoGProperties.getDefault().getProxyFile() for the default globus proxy location
Throws:
IOException - if something goes wrong

writeToDisk

public static void writeToDisk(GSSCredential gssCred)
                        throws IOException,
                               GSSException
Writes a GSSCredential to the default globus location

Parameters:
gssCred - the credential
Throws:
GSSException - if something is strange with the GSSCredential
IOException - if something's wonky with the file / file permission

writeToDisk

public static void writeToDisk(GSSCredential gssCred,
                               File proxyFile)
                        throws IOException,
                               GSSException
Writes a GSSCredential to disk

Parameters:
gssCred - the credential
proxyFile - the file you want to save the credential to
Throws:
IOException - if something's wonky with the file / file permission
GSSException - if something is strange with the GSSCredential
